lyrics:
23 contributorskotov syndrome lyricsverse 1
theyre high on the watchtower keeping the peace
whatever that means
cause you see the world through
crosshairs and tvs dont you
ten foot walls built around us white picket death
so quiet so safe
if we fall therell be nothing and no one to catch us
sit back and watch as we

chorus
spin out of control
spin out of control
try to recover but collide with each other we
spin out of control

verse 2
something i cannot change
i was born in a place that lives by the sword
and thus to its blade were condemned
dont you understand why we scream no more
my dreams are of children orphaned by blood
spilled at these hands
and here on the graves of the innocent
we raise our flag
you might also likechorus
spin out of control
spin out of control
try to recover but collide with each other we
spin out of control

bridge
some things you dont forgive some things you dont forget
sometimes the fate you suffer is so much worse than death
but were off course now and were drifting out to sea
so cut the anchor on your heart to be set free
set free
set free

outro
spin out of control
spin out of control
spin out of control
spin out of control
try to recover we have to recover
we fall and crash one after the other
spin out of control4embed
